A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't care about these characters.  And the ones I do like (Han Solo\, Luke Skywalker\, Leah\, Chubacca\, R2D2 and C3PO) were never reunited all together.  The most Epic waste of potential awesomeness of all time.  It's almost as if the writer/director didn't like Star Wars.   The remaining characters\, who do we care about?  Rey? Poe? Fin? They're as fun as dentist's waiting room.
